Question: What is the opposite of an area of elevation?
Options: A. disgust B. reduction C. depression D. demotion E. diminishment
The opposite of an area of elevation is C. depression. An area of elevation refers to a raised or elevated part of the terrain, while a depression refers to a low or sunken part of the terrain.
